useCase.name: Deployment of a New Dataset Type Version

mainSequence.step: Check for existing versions in Deployment Module
Retrieve current versions of dataset type in Version Control
List of current versions sent from Dataset Management to Version Control
Confirm existing versions by Version Control
Create new version in Deployment Module
Register new dataset type version in Version Control
Version registered successfully by Dataset Management
New version created by Version Control
Include new dataset type in app artifact in App Artifact Repository
App artifact updated by App Artifact Repository
Deployment successful, notification sent to AppDeveloper
